entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing the dotnet 7 SDK on Ubuntu Jammy seems to only install the runtime. #32804
  • Project which Built in Windows does not clean with command in Ubuntu #32803

PullRequests

Created

  • Back up to latest 17.7 build for p5 #32826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2188153 #32811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • BlazorWasmSdk: Fix duplicate imports #32799
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.4xx] support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Read workload sets in workload manifest reader #32766
    Area-Workloads
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Preview 6 branding #32796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make GenerateToolsSettingsFileFromBuildProperty incremental #32798
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package (#29787) #32734
    Area-Compilers, Servicing-approved, 7.0.8
  • add two artifacts-output-related-telemetry properties to emitted events #32685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged
